rows.label: qst104301_msg001
rows.name: Hey, you! I've got a favor to ask!

rows.label: qst104301_msg002
rows.name:
Take a look at this. It's got
a funny shape, doesn't it?

rows.label: qst104301_msg003
rows.name:
I want to sell this for a high
price. Over 10,000G, if possible!

rows.label: qst104301_msg004
rows.name:
...Yeah, I know it probably
won't fetch a price like that.

rows.label: qst104301_msg005
rows.name:
But I absolutely have to
sell this for a high price!

rows.label: qst104301_msg006
rows.name:
We refugees are just barely
surviving on small rations.

rows.label: qst104301_msg007
rows.name:
But lately, the amount's gotten
even smaller... It's not rare to
only eat once or twice a day.

rows.label: qst104301_msg008
rows.name:
My wife and daughter must be
starving, but they endure it
without a single complaint.

rows.label: qst104301_msg009
rows.name:
I want to treat them to a
good meal, just once, and
let them eat their fill.

rows.label: qst104301_msg010
rows.name:
To do that, I have to sell this for
a high price and get the funds.

rows.label: qst104401_msg011
rows.name:
Fortunately, I know a shop that
might buy it for a good price.

rows.label: qst104301_msg012
rows.name:
I heard there's a shop in Acedia's
port that only opens at night and
buys anything for a high price.

rows.label: qst104301_msg013
rows.name:
The shop's name is Magogo Namu.
Can you sell this there for me?

rows.label: qst104301_msg014
rows.name: Thanks! I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst104301_msg101
rows.name: So, how'd it go? Did you sell it?

rows.label: qst104301_msg102
rows.name:
...I see, not yet. I know it's
an unreasonable request, but
please, sell it for 10,000G.

rows.label: qst104301_msg201
rows.name: So, how'd it go? Did you sell it?

rows.label: qst104301_msg202
rows.name:
What?! 12,000G!? I can't believe
it sold for that much! It was
the right call to ask you!

rows.label: qst104301_msg203
rows.name:
You really helped me out, thanks.
Please take this 2,000G as a reward.

rows.label: qst104301_msg204
rows.name:
No matter how hard up I
am, I can't be disrespectful
to my benefactors.

rows.label: qst104301_msg205
rows.name:
The 10,000G I asked you for is
here. That's more than enough.

rows.label: qst104301_msg206
rows.name:
Oh, and if you don't mind,
please take this too.

rows.label: qst104301_msg207
rows.name:
I have no idea what it's
for, but... really, thank
you. I'll never forget this.
